com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.geometry

Class WZSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.geometry.WZSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<WZSize>

    public class WZSize
extends Object
implements Comparable<WZSize>, Serializable
    The WZSize class represents a dimension with integer-based width and height values.

    Usage example:

             WZSize frameSize = WZSize(1280, 720);
         float aspectRatio = frameSize.aspectRatio();
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WZSize.ScaledDimensions
      ScaledDimensions is a utility class representing common scaling operations when placing one rectangular area (the source) within another (the destination)

      • offset

        public static WZSize offset(int w1,
                            int h1,
                            int w2,
                            int h2)
        Calculates the offset between two dimensions. The returned values may be negative if the width and/or height values of the first dimension are greater than the corresponding values in the second dimension.
        Parameters:
        w1 - The width value of the first dimension
        h1 - The height value of the first dimension
        w2 - The width value of the second dimension
        h2 - The height value of the second dimension
        Returns:
        The offset between the two dimensions.
